entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
